title: Kindergarten
subject: Essential Elements for English Language Arts (2024-)

document.title: Iowa Academic Standards Essential Elements for English Languange Arts

A9D4E306FAF5418EA88454F6FC4416F4.description:
With guidance and support, use words acquired
through conversations, being read to, and during shared
reading activities.

29D841DC03C14C3FB6628D8278565AAF.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate an
understanding of common verbs.

57DF40C5EB524DF29F57C050E2820B12.description:
With guidance and support, use words to
communicate in real-life situations.

634ECB18D7C44D8AB0AE416E8CF89387.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate
understanding of frequently occurring opposites.

9F2FC623CF664ED9B669ED523C86726B.description:
With guidance and support, sort common objects
into familiar categories.

82B73AC097AF486DA12994E81DB08FF2.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of word
relationships.

76DF0DC4321F4C4A963F81F6C124E323.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate
understanding of words used in every day routines.

CF9C7F93C3D143AC850DEBBF6B1CD83F.description:
Demonstrate emerging knowledge of word
meanings.

A0B4B1B90E5B4ACDBF163579E8A91A9E.description:
With guidance and support, link two or more words
together in communication.

E526CC1A1E7D430AB56090E53FA03B18.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate
understanding of common prepositions: on, off, in,
out.

06A5D22C07DC4775BB48333CCED37448.description:
With guidance and support, identify answers to
simple questions (e.g., who, what) from an array of
choices.

EB1F1B40058A4CCFBD293DC83E4363C3.description:
With guidance and support, use frequently
occurring plural nouns.

D2F4B36A5BC24575B92BC9C6B7B1F59F.description:
With guidance and support, use frequently
occurring nouns in communication.

3B341F34177241048EE1EF94E4E515BD.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish between
letters and other symbols or shapes.

DFE1B54BB0554646BC423746DCAC55CF.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of letter
and word use.

77F114CB847448C8B59E751222F96D4C.description:
With guidance and support, communicate
thoughts, feelings, and ideas.

78C4BDBEA7C949C8A0329E5E56639450.description:
With guidance and support, add or select
drawings or other visual or tactual displays that relate to
familiar people, places, things, and events.

295E99F9E5954BF3BA2BDE5CA17511A9.description:
With guidance and support, identify familiar
people, places, things, and events.

5EC371CA2A2340889A71DBDEB54DCDCB.description:
Demonstrate an emerging understanding of a
familiar text read aloud or information presented orally or
through other media by answering questions.

5BFBA3A3293C46289574E164B869B7CE.description:
Participate in multiple-turn communication
exchanges with support from adults.

D6E3A7142EDA4CC5A7AA7980275C272E.description:
Communicate directly with supportive adults or
peers.

FDAEEF9CA27C4FD5949CB4576154217E.description:
With guidance and support from adults, identify
information, objects, or events that relate to personal
experiences.

1833315D2D42470EA8D46268A1F0A22C.description:
With guidance and support, participate in shared
research and writing objects.

0970BA267F5F4D84BE33DE9F9F7BA757.description: Research to Build and Present Knowledge

14B6E7C385B74A5CA955E777D74114C1.description:
With guidance and support from adults, explore
a variety of digital tools to produce individual or group
writing.

96D08A5AFA294DFE9614359352247A15.description:
With guidance and support, select an event and
use drawing, dictating, or writing and share information
about it.

E94E991AEC284A889CFBAD98B6D030A6.description:
With guidance and support, select a familiar
topic and use drawing, dictating, or writing to share
information about the topic.

57FC213E176A46B8A15B307125CF9AAD.description:
With guidance and support, select a familiar
book and use drawing, dictating, or writing to state an
opinion about it.

90BA11E8528E44E09427683E1A0524BB.description:
Engage in purposeful shared reading of familiar
text.

3B0AEA158F4F4288B7927AD0A73336D7.description:
With guidance and support, recognize
environmental print.

15F791001B0C492A98BF1C1B175BC7F6.description:
With guidance and support, recognize first letter of
own name in print.

5D7A2C0C758043B8912B5C79ED87762A.description:
With guidance and support, recognize rhyming
words.

76EFB475F0EB4DAFA486CF4AF0D8525C.description:
With guidance and support, identify single-syllable
spoken words with the same onset (beginning
sound) as a familiar word.

FD84C78DE5E44EF39F3677993A9778D1.description:
With guidance and support, recognize the number
of words in a spoken message.

E597AF2DB1B14154A1F8A8E0E3EC8C88.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of
spoken words, syllables, and sounds (phonemes).

F124CEAAE5FB4E8BBE532CC35D160245.description:
With guidance and support during shared reading,
demonstrate understanding that books are read
one page at a time from beginning to end.

E3FC72C1539C43228D7BBD761F85B0C1.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of the
organization of print.

146DCF155B8B492A8ABE5C621E0D87FB.description: Reading and Writing Standards: Foundational Skills

D1C6149E7CD34BD799990F2D497BD15F.description:
With guidance and support, actively engage in
shared reading of informational text.

CFE9145A1910441CA9441E353D34B227.description: Range of Reading and Level of Text Complexity

5CF9C804A4094FE9926EEF109ED62A7D.description:
With guidance and support, match similar parts
of two familiar texts on the same topic.

8BF483D532764670AD57603D8AA829AE.description:
With guidance and support, identify points the
author makes in an informational text.

8CACBF01062C4458B48515FD4DAB9C96.description:
With guidance and support, identify illustrations
or objects/tactual information that go with a familiar text.

144903D1A77841F3BF96F1AB5F501315.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish between
words and illustrations in an informational text.

BD3C63F15F1D4145AB7BDF9226946757.description:
With guidance and support, identify the front
cover of a book.

EAE690A03BF948E28AFC0C4CD30687BB.description:
With guidance and support, indicate when an
unknown word is used in a text.

1374AFA8F12845059AAF8197F4A1400C.description:
With guidance and support, identify individuals,
events, or details in a familiar informational text.

026EB246717F4E6583061BD03EE26362.description:
With guidance and support, identify the topic of a
familiar text.

79F19EAF4D7D4BCEBA3579C86A0F3775.description:
With guidance and support, identify a detail in a
familiar text.

CD3C98558EAE4753A4516FCC9930E610.description:
With guidance and support, actively engage in
shared reading.

DDB5DBEAE0BB4C2FAEDFC5259C8AF2AA.description: Range of Reading and Level of Text Complexity

81B5727535F44172A26DE831486C8A83.description:
With guidance and support, identify the
adventures or experiences of a character in a familiar story.

37A012DE9BD2400891DC3EF5913FBD8A.description:
With guidance and support, identify illustrations
or objects/tactual information that go with a familiar story.

F97B96F31BD54789B27C153CA9C1C1A4.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish between
words and illustrations in a story.

7B9237E4349C41068E7192903C0D2A41.description:
With guidance and support, recognize familiar
texts (e.g., storybooks, poems).

FB29EAC7229546A79D10CEDDBF164C09.description:
With guidance and support, indicate when an
unknown word is used in a text.

1015B27AB9304877BBFA1FDC33A34850.description:
With guidance and support, identify characters
and settings in a familiar story.

51D3F33B016041E9B8835C1D4EF92FA9.description:
With guidance and support, identify major
events in familiar stories.

01D07CFA7F3746DD9C37DDA073D8EC81.description:
With guidance and support, identify details in
familiar stories.
